title: 2023 Sedona Healing Ceremonies, Buddhist & Native American
cleaned_text: About Sedona is a powerful place to begin and/or deepen your spiritual practice. Among the red rocks, we will create ceremony to set intentions for healing, transformation and manifestation in both the Buddhist and Native American traditions. You will leave with powerful and life transforming understanding that you can bring to your daily spiritual practice.
